title: Whitelist Reflexer as pool creator
body:
## Summary

Whitelist Reflexer as a pool creator so new pools such as #46 can be verified. This would give visiblity to a pool that focused around ETH and RAI as well as their derivatives with high collateral ratios.

## Background

Reflexer is one of the earliest users of Fuse starting with pool 9 which now has $20M TVL. We would now like to make a second, more degen pool focused on improving capital efficiency for RAI derivative tokens.

## Additional Information

Pool 46 will start with ETH, RAI, aRAI, sETH2 and wstETH and expand to other RAI derivatives such as Idle RAI.

## Vote Details

FOR: Whitelist Reflexer (0xfA5e4955a11902f849ECaddEf355Db69C2036de6) and the Reflexer Governor (0xa57A4e6170930ac547C147CdF26aE4682FA8262E) as pool creators on the Rari Fuse platform.
AGAINST: Do nothing.
author: 0xfA5e4955a11902f849ECaddEf355Db69C2036de6
